start.text: I'm movin' different.~ This shit ain't nothin' to me, man.~ I'm a dog. I'm bitin' the force bubbles in the bath.~ We smokin' Primordial Sludge.~ Smokin' that Coiled Lamb stilt dweller Hot and Spiny deluxe smooth peridot scratcher skunk bubba kush.~ We smokin' beetlebum.~ They must have amnesia, they forgot that I'm Sultan~ I'm sick in the head~ Reach for my neck, you'll get turned into an example

conversation.node: No, but the name sounds cool.
All kinds of grassy consumables. We straight gassin cutting straight to the bricks ha ha. I'm nice with it. Ha ha. I have no sympathy. I live for this shit.
